about_content.title: About us
about_content.body:
In the autumn of 2021 Paulette went through a change in ownership when two talented chefs, also known
from Jack´s Deli, Kalle Lindroth and Andreas Toth took over operations in Paulette. Kalle and Andreas have
been collecting experience from the top restaurants in Helsinki for years. “In Paulette we aim to create an
experience of atmospheric local restaurant where we get to share the knowledge and experiences that we
have been collecting for years. We want to offer amazing food and wine experiences to all you foodies out
there.”

about_content.title: Kitchen
about_content.body:
With Kalle and Andy in the kitchen we also have Jari. He has originally stranded from Suomenlinna and is
quite an enthusiastic about wild herbs. Diligent and professional Jari has been collecting wide experience in
different restaurants in Helsinki and has been around already from the beginning of Jack´s Deli.

about_content.title: Dining room
about_content.body:
Bringing bubbly and vibrant energy to the restaurant we have Nuppe and Sini. Professional take on the job
and genuine interest to food and beverages makes the service unaffected and comfortable. Their warm
presence and eye on details makes the ambience in our restaurant welcoming.

about_content.title: Food
about_content.body:
Our food is mostly all about French cuisine, but you can also find modern and northern flavors from the
plate. We love simple and clear flavors that bring the best out of seasonal products. Also, you can enrich
the experience with some carefully selected quality wines.
Although we love some classics, that will stick to the menu pretty much all year around, we like to chance
and adjust our menu seasonally to make the best out of local ingredients.
We are passionate about food and flavors, and that is exactly why we are here; to create unforgettable
experiences to our guests.

Bienvenue!

about_content.title: Catering
about_content.body:
Teemme myös tilauksesta catering toimituksia, tai voit myös tilata paikanpäälle kokin, sekä tarjoilijan jos niin haluat. Olethan yhteydessä sähköpostitse
